product_name: NOCO XGrid 44W USB Battery Pack + Flashlight
long_description: This compact battery unit packs backcountry power and illumination into a single device, energizing your favorite portable electronics at the campsite or shedding light on an emergency situation.
short_description: This compact battery unit packs backcountry power and illumination into a single device, energizing your favorite portable electronics at the campsite or shedding light on an emergency situation.
